naslov: SPLITSKA, BRAČ, NAMJEŠTENA VILA PRVI RED DO MORA (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Površina: 244 m² stambenog prostora na zemljištu od 548 m² Predstavljamo vam novoizgrađenu, luksuznu vilu smještenu u idiličnom okruženju, prvi red do mora. Vila nudi izuzetan spoj moderne arhitekture, vrhunskog dizajna i neopisivog pogleda na Jadransko more. Prizemlje: Otvoreni koncept dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaonice s izlazom na prostranu terasu. Velike staklene stijene unose obilje prirodnog svjetla, dok se terasa s bazenom, sunčalištem i vanjskom blagovaonicom idealno nadovezuje na unutarnji prostor. Uz to, tu su i gostinjski toalet, garderoba, tehnička soba te stubište. Prvi kat: Četiri prostrane spavaće sobe, svaka s vlastitom kupaonicom i izlazom na balkon, pružaju potpuni komfor i privatnost. Drugi kat: Dvije dodatne spavaće sobe s kupaonicama, sauna i mala privatna teretana – savršeno za opuštanje i održavanje kondicije. Svaka soba također ima vlastiti balkon s pogledom na more. Vila je potpuno namještena i opremljena najmodernijim uređajima, uključujući: Videonadzor i alarmni sustav, Klimatizacijske uređaje, Vrhunske kućanske aparate renomiranih proizvođača, Parking za 4 automobila Orijentacija: Sjever, Istok, Zapad Vila je trenutno u funkciji luksuznog najma, što je čini idealnom investicijom. Prilika za one koji traže ekskluzivnost, privatnost i udobnost uz miris mora. Požurite, jer ovakve nekretnine su rijetkost na tržištu! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Area: 244 m² of living space on a 548 m² plot We present to you a newly built, luxurious villa located in an idyllic setting, first row to the sea. The villa offers an exceptional blend of modern architecture, top design and indescribable views of the Adriatic Sea. Ground floor: Open concept living room, kitchen and dining room with access to a spacious terrace. Large glass walls bring in plenty of natural light, while the terrace with swimming pool, sundeck and outdoor dining area ideally connects to the interior space. In addition, there is a guest toilet, dressing room, technical room and staircase. First floor: Four spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and access to a balcony, provide complete comfort and privacy. Second floor: Two additional bedrooms with bathrooms, a sauna and a small private gym - perfect for relaxing and keeping fit. Each room also has its own balcony with a sea view. The villa is fully furnished and equipped with the most modern devices, including: Video surveillance and alarm system, Air conditioning units, Top-quality household appliances from renowned manufacturers, Parking for 4 cars Orientation: North, East, West The villa is currently in the function of a luxury rental, which makes it an ideal investment. An opportunity for those looking for exclusivity, privacy and comfort with the smell of the sea. Hurry up, because such properties are rare on the market!
